key.name: draw-background
key.description: Have MATE draw the desktop background.

key.name: show-desktop-icons
key.description: Have MATE file manager (Caja) draw the desktop icons.

key.name: background-fade
key.description: If set to true, then MATE will change the desktop background with a fading effect.

key.name: picture-options
key.description: Determines how the image set by wallpaper_filename is rendered. Possible values are "wallpaper", "centered", "scaled", "stretched", "zoom", "spanned".

key.name: picture-filename
key.description: File to use for the background image.

key.name: picture-opacity
key.description: Opacity with which to draw the background picture.

key.name: primary-color
key.description: Left or Top color when drawing gradients, or the solid color.

key.name: secondary-color
key.description: Right or Bottom color when drawing gradients, not used for solid color.

key.name: color-shading-type
key.description: How to shade the background color. Possible values are "horizontal-gradient", "vertical-gradient", and "solid".
